summary: The diff addresses backend actor initialization and file upload restoration, but lacks explicit verification of favicon display functionality and uploaded files UI display testing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify uploaded files display correctly in the UI with shareable links after fixing the upload failure, maintaining the existing UploadsList component behavior
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of changes to UploadsList component or explicit verification/testing of file display functionality after the fix. The diff shows upload logic but no modifications to the display components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the favicon at /assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png continues to display in the browser tab while file upload functionality remains working
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff that favicon functionality was tested or verified. frontend/index.html is only mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt with a truncated description, but no actual changes to favicon implementation are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup functionality with ProfileSetupModal component including user name collection and profile management
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused on fixing file upload failures caused by favicon implementation. User profile setup, name collection, and profile management are not mentioned in requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile storage and retrieval methods including getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, and saveCallerUserProfile
hallucinated_features.reason: These profile-related backend methods and frontend hooks are not requested in the BuildRequest, which focuses solely on fixing upload functionality and maintaining favicon display.
